titleStmt.title: A sermon briefly comparing the estate of King Salomon and his subiectes togither with the condition of Queene Elizabeth and her people preached in Sainct Maries in Oxford the 17. of Nouember, and now printed with some small alteration, by Iohn Prime, 1585
titleStmt.author: Prime, John, 1550-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes printer to the Vniuersitie,

notesStmt.note: In another edition (STC 20371.5) line 3 of title has: subiects.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
